newsitem.title: UK: Average discount rate at UK bill tender 5.5142 pct.
newsitem.headline: Average discount rate at UK bill tender 5.5142 pct.

text.p: The average rate of discount at the weekly tender of 91-day UK Treasury bills fell to 5.5142 percent from 5.5345 percent last week, the Bank of England said on Friday.
The 400 million stg offer attracted bids of 1.845 billion stg. The pro rata price was 98.625.
Next week 400 million stg of bills will be on offer.
